name: MeasurableSpace.measurableSet_invariants
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : MeasurableSpace α
f : α → α
s : Set α
⊢ Iff (MeasurableSet s) (And (MeasurableSet s) (Eq (Set.preimage f s) s))
decl:
/-- A set `s` is `(invariants f)`-measurable
iff it is meaurable w.r.t. the canonical σ-algebra on `α` and `f ⁻¹' s = s`. -/
theorem measurableSet_invariants {f : α → α} {s : Set α} :
    MeasurableSet[invariants f] s ↔ MeasurableSet s ∧ f ⁻¹' s = s :=
  .rfl

name: MeasurableSpace.invariants_id
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : MeasurableSpace α
⊢ Eq (MeasurableSpace.invariants id) inst✝
decl:
@[simp]
theorem invariants_id : invariants (id : α → α) = ‹MeasurableSpace α› :=
  ext fun _ ↦ ⟨And.left, fun h ↦ ⟨h, rfl⟩⟩

name: MeasurableSpace.invariants_le
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : MeasurableSpace α
f : α → α
⊢ LE.le (MeasurableSpace.invariants f) inst✝
decl: theorem invariants_le (f : α → α) : invariants f ≤ ‹MeasurableSpace α› := fun _ ↦ And.left

name: MeasurableSpace.inf_le_invariants_comp
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : MeasurableSpace α
f g : α → α
⊢ LE.le (Min.min (MeasurableSpace.invariants f) (MeasurableSpace.invariants g)) (MeasurableSpace.invariants (Function.comp f g))
decl:
theorem inf_le_invariants_comp (f g : α → α) :
    invariants f ⊓ invariants g ≤ invariants (f ∘ g) := fun s hs ↦
  ⟨hs.1.1, by rw [preimage_comp, hs.1.2, hs.2.2]⟩

name: MeasurableSpace.le_invariants_iterate
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : MeasurableSpace α
f : α → α
n : Nat
⊢ LE.le (MeasurableSpace.invariants f) (MeasurableSpace.invariants (Nat.iterate f n))
decl:
theorem le_invariants_iterate (f : α → α) (n : ℕ) :
    invariants f ≤ invariants (f^[n]) := by
  induction n with
  | zero => simp [invariants_le]
  | succ n ihn => exact le_trans (le_inf ihn le_rfl) (inf_le_invariants_comp _ _)

name: MeasurableSpace.measurable_invariants_dom
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝¹ : MeasurableSpace α
β : Type u_2
inst✝ : MeasurableSpace β
f : α → α
g : α → β
⊢ Iff (Measurable g) (And (Measurable g) (∀ (s : Set β), MeasurableSet s → Eq (Set.preimage (Function.comp g f) s) (Set.preimage g s)))
decl:
theorem measurable_invariants_dom {f : α → α} {g : α → β} :
    Measurable[invariants f] g ↔ Measurable g ∧ ∀ s, MeasurableSet s → (g ∘ f) ⁻¹' s = g ⁻¹' s := by
  simp only [Measurable, ← forall_and]; rfl

name: MeasurableSpace.measurable_invariants_of_semiconj
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝¹ : MeasurableSpace α
β : Type u_2
inst✝ : MeasurableSpace β
fa : α → α
fb : β → β
g : α → β
hg : Measurable g
hfg : Function.Semiconj g fa fb
⊢ Measurable g
decl:
theorem measurable_invariants_of_semiconj {fa : α → α} {fb : β → β} {g : α → β} (hg : Measurable g)
    (hfg : Semiconj g fa fb) : @Measurable _ _ (invariants fa) (invariants fb) g := fun s hs ↦
  ⟨hg hs.1, by rw [← preimage_comp, hfg.comp_eq, preimage_comp, hs.2]⟩
